description.text:
At 5th level, a constable's badge becomes a powerful symbol of rules and authority. As long as he wears his badge, allies within 30 feet who can see him gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against charm, compulsion, and fear effects and a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls against targets the constable has challenged.
At 10th level and every 5 levels thereafter, the bonuses increase by 1.
